subject: Olympic Games (2008)
Swimming
lead_paragraph: Scott Spann was the only American to qualify for the final of the 200-meter breaststroke, almost30 years after the 1980 U.S. boycott sidetracked his father’s Olympic dreams.
snippet: Scott Spann was the only American to qualify for the final of the 200-meter breaststroke, almost30 years after the 1980 U.S. boycott sidetracked his father’s Olympic dreams.
